Yandex Disk.name: P04.01
Yandex Disk.description: For each type of user information the company collects, does the company clearly disclose whether it shares that user information?

Yandex Disk.name: P04.02
Yandex Disk.description: For each type of user information the company shares, does the company clearly disclose the types of third parties with which it shares that user information?

Yandex Disk.name: P04.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it may share user information with government(s) or legal authorities?

Yandex Disk.name: P04.04
Yandex Disk.description: For each type of user information the company shares, does the company clearly disclose the names of all third parties with which it shares user information?

Yandex Disk.name: P04.05
Yandex Disk.description: (For mobile ecosystems): Does the company clearly disclose that it evaluates whether the privacy policies of third party apps made available through its app store disclose what user information the apps share?

Yandex Disk.name: P04.06
Yandex Disk.description: (For mobile ecosystems): Does the company clearly disclose that it evaluates whether the privacy policies of third party apps made available through its app store disclose the types of third parties with whom they share user information?

Yandex Disk.name: P04.07
Yandex Disk.description: (For personal digital assistant ecosystems): Does the company clearly disclose that it evaluates whether the privacy policies of third party skills made available through its skill store disclose what user information the skills share?

Yandex Disk.name: P04.08
Yandex Disk.description: (For personal digital assistant ecosystems): Does the company clearly disclose that it evaluates whether the privacy policies of third party skills made available through its skill store disclose the types of third parties with whom they share user information?
